reviewText: The description didn't state that this DVD wouldnt work in the USA.  I obviously opened it up to watch the DVD to find out that this DVD did not work in United States would get an error code. When I contacted the seller they stated that they would not be able to refund me due to the package being open. How was I supposed to know that the DVD was not for the  United States DVD equipment.
Disc is worthless if your DVD player was purchased in the US.  This is a Zone 2 disc - incompatible with US DVD Players.
my dvd player will not read it
Only down side was that the dvd's were in European format that would not work on most of my players.
